content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day July 9, 2018 Data Breach Report Underscores Phishing Risk for Manufacturers July 9, 2018 The business impact of phishing is becoming increasingly more pronounced. According to the recently released 2018 Verizon Data Breach Investigations Report, 93 of all reported IT security breaches are the direct result of some form of phishing.
